pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computation of Generalized Nash Equilibria // Compute standard and generalized Nash Equilibria of non-cooperative games. Optimization methods available are nonsmooth reformulation, fixed-point formulation, minimization problem and constrained- equation reformulation. See e.g. Kanzow and Facchinei (2010), doi:10.1007/s10479-009-0653-x.
